snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes iPhone 5 complaints via Saturday Night Live, agencies on both sides of the Atlantic cooperating to protect data...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes iPhone 5 complaints via Saturday Night Live, agencies on both sides of the Atlantic cooperating to protect data privacy and adding a music-streaming service to the next version of Windows.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Xbox Music, and H.P. Going Astray
